name: S.S. & Associates
overview:
Established in the year 2010, at Delhi (India), we, “S.S. & Associates”, are engaged in supplying, trading, & operating a comprehensive range of Automated Beverage Vending Machine, Automated Coffee Vending Machine, Vending Machine, Non Refrigerated Electronic Vending Machine and Cheque Deposit Vending Machine.

Operating & Maintenance Philosophy: Pa G’s Vending Express is not only about installing or handing over Vending Machine, it is all about effective & successful operations. All of our vending machines are clean, new and state of the art. Rupees Bill acceptors are standard for all equipment.

Reason To Choose: Latest vending machine technology. Custom made machines. Service 7 days a week. No paper work involved with stock or cash reconciliations. No staff involvement or labour costs. Response time as little as 2 hours. Regular contact for refund requests.

Our Quality Assurance: Our consistent efforts to offer a quality collection of Automated Beverage Vending Machine, Snacks Machine, etc. have given us the popularity of being a prominent company in this domain. The entire range is extensively recognized by our precious clients owing to their features like hassle-free performance, robust construction, high durability and temperature resistivity.

Client Satisfaction: Owing to our sincere and dedicated efforts, we have established ourselves strongly in the market. Backed by skilled and experienced professionals, we are engaged in trading and supplying a wide range of Automated Beverage Vending Machines, Snacks Machines, and Candy Machines which are fabricated by our vendors in accordance with client specifications.

Why Us ?: International quality standard range Expert team of engineers, industrial designers and other supporting staff Customized packaging Competitive prices
